Detailed Description

Main ajax class for Osimo that all other ajax classes extend.

Author:
Ryan LeFevre

OsimoAjax (  ) 

Class constructor

Definition at line 16 of file ajax.class.php.

register ( $  triggers  )  [protected]

Used to register all the ajax triggers for the current ajax class. A trigger is a variable set in Javascript and set over ajax so that PHP knows what function to execute to handle the incoming ajax data. All incoming POST variables are pulled into Osimo's class scope.

Parameters:
Array $triggers

Definition at line 31 of file ajax.class.php.

json_return ( $  data  )  [protected]

Simple function that echoes data in json format and halts script execution.

Parameters:
mixed $data

Definition at line 55 of file ajax.class.php.

json_error ( $  data  )  [protected]

Similar to json_return except the default index for an error is "error" instead of "data". This function also halts script execution.

Parameters:
mixed $data
